<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
  <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/>
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />
  <meta name="robots" content="all" />
  <meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://qzone.qq.com/gy/404/style/404style.css">
</head>
<body>
  <script type="text/plain" src="http://www.qq.com/404/search_children.js"
          charset="utf-8" homePageUrl="/"
          homePageName="">
  </script>
  <script src="https://qzone.qq.com/gy/404/data.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
  <script src="https://qzone.qq.com/gy/404/page.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
</body>
</html>

Post.title: typescript/webpack
Post.content:
ts+jquery+webpack,

  • node -v v10.15.3
  • npm -v 7.20.6
  • tsc -v 4.4.3 npm install typescript -g
  • webpack -v 5.52.1
  • webpack-cli -v 3.3.12 webpack-cli
  • webpack-dev-server -v 3.11.2

srcdist

  • src/asset: eg:jqeurywebpackcopy
  • src/css :
  • src/images :
  • src/js : typescriptjs
  • src/ts : ts
  • src/index.html : js

npm

  • proectnpm init package.json
  • package.jsonscriptswebpack
  • npm install cross-env -S

    cross-envcross-envnode.js
    cross-env NODE_ENV=sit node.js

typescript

  • tsc --init tsconfig.json

  • tscincludetsoutDirjses5

webpack

  • npm install webpack@5 webpack-cli@3 webpack-dev-server@3 -D
  • npm install copy-webpack-plugin -D
  • webpack.config.js

    mode

1node.jspathfsprocess

  • path: node.jseg:\/,node__dirname

    __dirnamenode js

    node index.js node
    index.htmlindex.js undefined,

  • fs: fs.readdirSync(dirPath)src eg:[assets, css, js]
  • process: Node.js node

2webpackcopy-webapck-plugin

  • copy-webapck-plugin:copy

    jquerycopy

  • webpackDefinePluginnode.jsjs
